column4: hi... i just got ubuntu installled via the alternate installer.. i would like to know how to view my batt level
right click the top menu banner and click 'add to panel' then scroll down, you will see a batt meter applet
any like profile stuff (eg: when on batt mode, less power utilisation , etc) any way to like customise
betway to keep the batt usage low, is to lower the display brightness.... beyond that, you could set up a go-to-standby after idletime
